uc:usecase.uc:name: Trigger Dispute
uc:usecase.uc:goal: Possibility to trigger a dispute related to a certain transaction.
uc:usecase.uc:stakeholder: Consumer wants to trigger a dispute for a certain transaction.
Merchant to have a fix way to handle disputes about transactions.

uc:guarantees.uc:success: Consumer is notified that dispute has been received by the merchant.
uc:guarantees.minimal: Consumer is notified that triggering dispute failed.

uc:success.uc:step:
Consumer enters the dispute form carrying the following information:
PI data (including account data) credential transaction id .
System checks, if there is an account for the given payment instrument.
System checks, if the credential is valid for that account.
System checks, if the transaction id does exist.
System checks, if the transaction id does match to the merchant/PI account.

System displays a form:
Name E-Mail Reason of the dispute .
System notifies Merchant about the new dispute.
System notifes the consumer that dispute has been forwarded to the merchant.

uc:extension.name: ACCOUNT DOES NOT EXIST
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Consumer that account does not exist.

uc:extension.name: INVALID CREDENTIAL
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Consumer that he is not allowd to see the transaction view.

uc:extension.name: UNKNOWN TRANSACTION
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Consumer that transaction is not known to the system.

uc:extension.name: WRONG TRANSACTION
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Consumer that the transaction is not related to the consumers account.
